text: To stay competitive in business, organizations need to be agile.
Traditional business intelligence systems slow you down by not
providing a programmatic way to access and manage your
BI assets. Introducing new expanded API
capabilities in Amazon QuickSight that let
you programmatically access the underlying data models
of BI assets via the AWS Software Development kit.
Create, deploy and manage your
QuickSight deployments at a pace that matches your business.
The new API capabilities help
to accelerate your BI migrations from legacy BI
tools to the cloud. And with the expanded API capabilities,
you can manage your BI dashboards and
reports just like software code - tracking and auditing
every change before deployment.
You can also create programmatic solutions to translate legacy
BI assets into cloud-native dashboards, including
visualizations, filters and calculations,
reducing migration time from
months to weeks. Accelerate innovation.
Increase agility  - with Amazon QuickSight.
